tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Lalith Agrawal, A True Professional, Ethical and Expertise Cardiologist….. 
 
It was a great experience and very glad that me and my mom met Dr. Lalith Agrawal at the right time. This Doctor proves to be the best cardiologist in around Manikonda area. He is detailed and accurate when it comes to his understanding of his patient’s health concerns. 

I was bit scared to meet Doctors as you all know unlike the scary industry out there wherein doctors dupe you for unnecessary tests and terrify you. 
But Dr. Lalith, A dynamic professional, whom you can blindly trust when it comes to getting the best expertise to handle your beloved one's health & life.

He treats you like a family member, listens to all your complaints & quarries very patiently and explains you about your condition very politely & proficiently, so that you don’t get scared but make you realize of your condition and next course of action. I really admire the way he deals with his patients, I really saved my life, thank you Dr. Lalith Agrawal. 

Without any doubt I would highly recommend Dr. Lalith Agrawal to anybody
reply_text:
Thanq mr Pradeep.
But I would tell you ...
It was timely decision by u and ur family to undergo angiogram and angioplasty subsequently which has saved ur life. Would wish u a speedy recovery and all the very best in ur future endeavours. 
Take care mr Pradeep.

review: Doctor was friendly and gave some valuable tips, He understands the concern and gives valuable suggestions

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Took my mother-in-law for treatment over heart pain. 

Dr. Lalith Agarwal was extremely patient and listened to all the symptoms and gave medical recommendations accordingly. 

His calming and friendly nature helped with our anxiety and at the same time he was very clear with best- and worst-case scenarios explaining them clearly to help us understand what should be done urgently without causing unnecessary panic or fear.

He suggested for Angiogram but before that he ensured that its absolutely essential and his expertise and behavior instills a deep trust in him as a doctor.

100% would recommend my family and friends.

Dr Lalith Agarwal has been wonderful, he explained the risks on various aspects due to hypertension and very patiently and nicely guided me the prevention to be done including medication, excercise and monitoring the hypertension regularly. He cautioned the dangers of not taking medication due to my family history and guided the way to control and improve the heart health.  I actually wanted to go and doctor in apollo and changed my decision which proved very wise due to personal care Dr Agarwal has taken in handling the case
reply_text: Hi mr baseer. Good to listen that you had a pleasant experience with us. Hoping that you maintain good health and control your blood pressure at the earliest.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Doctor is pretty intelligent and can interpret your issue even when provided with a lot of data. If you give too many data points, most doctors usually can't process, not this one.

I went for irregular heartbeat problem, within 20 mins all the necessary tests were conducted to rule out any serious heart condition. 

I am delighted with the speed with which I was diagnosed and a logical data driven conclusion was provided in the end (which was the fact that I was fine).

I would recommend Dr Lalith to everyone!
reply_text: Happy to see that you got solution to your problem.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My father was having chest pain since there months. Visited couple of doctors before consulting Dr Lalith agarwal. He did tests like echo and TMT.  Both came normal but even then chest pain was persisting.  Dr advised CT coronary Angiography and it showed cardiac blocks in the arteries. Then he advised angiography which showed multiple blocks.  Stenting was done after which the chest pain got received. Father is doing well now and able to walk for five kilometres now which is his original capacity.  The patient oriented approach of doctor is note worthy and never tries to push for any procedure or any admission.  Very good approach for taking care of my father.  Difficult to find such doctors now a days.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Uncle was suffering with chest pain. Had evaluation with dr lalith and diagnosed to have heart stroke. Admission was done and angiography was also done. Multiple blocks were discovered. I was vey apprehensive for further treatment. Took multiple opinions and found that advise given by dr was best and convincing. So went ahead with angioplasty. My uncle is doing very well now. Approach of doctor is patient oriented and straight forward. After treatment uncle is doing good now. Happy to be with sich a doctor. Makes a difficult procees easy.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Visited to consult Lalith Sir about issue with pain in left hand, Pressure in Heart, And Blood pressure in July'21. He suggested to have the angiogram done and with all reports conclusively recommended for medical supervision. I was bit skeptical with the word angiogram, but the way he explained to me and level of comfort as more than Doctor as a friend I had with him was very satisfactory . All went pretty well and post angiogram visit also was also very nice . Overall highly recommended to consult him based on my personal experience . he is very connected to his patients. Always there to help . Thanks a lot to the Doctor from core of my heart.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review:
The doctor is very professional, polite and gave full attention to hear our problem. He was not in hurry to prescribe any medication. He listened each and everything and asked all the medical history. Hard to believe he is so young and still have so much patience to sit with his patients which hard to see in any doctors. I was so worried and he just made me calm. Well my treatment is still going on so will keep adding to it. But so far I loved meeting Dr Lalith.
He is so well in his skills and life saving person. I will strongly recommend Dr. Lalith for any future reference related to Cardio.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review: Doctor Lalit sir understands your problem very well, my mother was suffering from severe hypertension, Doc took his time and changed the old medications am really happy with lalit sir's approach, He listens to everything that you have to say and most importantly Doctor Lalit gives you confidence that everything is going to be fine I think that psychological push is very much important to boost moral of any patient... With new medications as of now everything is fine... After a week I have a review by then I hope my mother will be in normal limits of her hypertension.... Definately pay a visit to a doctor he's one of the best doctors I have ever came across... Thank you so much for your guidence Lalit sir

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I visited Dr Lalit Agarwal at his clinic along with my father who is suffering with abnormal high BP, I chose Dr Agarwals clinic entirely on the basis of positive reviews in practo and am happy that I made a good decision,
   Dr Lalit Agarwal is a friendly doctor with a lot of patience, he listened to my father's problem carefully and performed 2D echo and TMT and gave prescription accordingly, he counselled my father about lifestyle changes and I can clearly see a lot of positive change in my father since then, the clinic was good and well equipped,

We had visited Dr. Lalith Agarwal after my father complained heaviness in chest and breathing difficulties. We were lucky to have cardiologist in Manikonda (at a walking distance from home) . Doctor clearly listened to all symptoms of my father, advised not to panic and gave confidence. Doctor checked BP, performed 2D Echo and ECG. My father symptoms subsided after he started using medicines and followed all precautions prescribed by doctor. Later, TMT and CT coronary Angiogram were performed and results were normal. He is always approachable when in need. Overall, we are happy to get treatment from Dr. Lalith and I would recommend him for any heart related health issues.
Thank you doctor.
reply_text:
Hope ur father does well and never has any trouble.
All the best.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I have been privileged to meet Dr.LALITH AGARWAL, treated my father as if he was his own, during all our meetings with him. He was a kind, always very professional, thorough & had an excellent bedside manner.
My father had major blockages in his coronary arteries. Later he received successful quadruple Angioplasty. Since then Dr. Lalith Agarwal has monitored my father's recovery every step of the way. I feel blessed to be under the care of one of the eminent cardiologists ie Dr. Lalith Agarwal. 
He was very concerned about my father heart health diet & overall health. He explained the importance of everything what should & shouldn't indulge in.
Finally I'm so happy that I now have a cardiologist that I feel comfortable with & I'm highly recommending him to everyone I know.
Thank you Dr. Lalith Agarwal for all your support & care towards my father.
Doctor is very friendly and explained everything perfectly. Staffs was also very coordinating.can be recommended to others

I express my thanks  to Dr Lalith Agrawal. God bless him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review: My daughter was having fast heart beat. On recommendation of pediatrician i visited dr agarwal. Echocardiography was done and diagnosed with hole in the heart. Doctor recommended device closure. I was afraid and took second opinion from another doctor.  Advise given was the same. The way dr agarwal explained the issue was commendable. So i proceeded with him. Procefure done was ASD device closure.  He is very good at intervention skill. Procedure was done with great accuracy.  My daughter is doing very well. I would like to highly recommend him for any heart related issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pain in Left part of Chest,
review: Hi..Yesterday my mother got suddenly pain in chest at 4.00 p.m,then I've googled immediately in my locality then I've found Dr.Lalith Agarwal and taken appointment for 5.30 p.m. At 5.45 p.m visited the hospital in 15-20 minutes we met the doctor soon Dr.Lalith had talked to my mother regarding chest pain and checked the BP which was 170/100.Soon doctor tested for 2D Echo which came normal then asked to test for TMT,that also normal.Then Dr.Lalith clarified and explained no need to worry about the pain.He explained briefly about 30 minutes,then we got relaxed. Thank you so much for the patience and care he showed towards the patient.I would like to suggest Dr.Lalith Agarwal for any chest and Heart Related issues.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: a lot of time saved. and stress avoided. dr. agarwal explains nicely and patiently how he is proceeding with the diagnosis after careful examination of your reports and previous medical history and therefore we are very satisfied with him. also the good thing with his heart centre is that you don't need to spend a day for consulting then a day for tests and then consulting again as all the basic required tests are done at his centre itself and the reports are immediately available. thus you save so much of time(that is 2 days work in 1.5 to 2 hours, also saving all the to and fro rides to diagnostics) and are told what the problem is in a detailed and mannered way.it was nice consulting dr. agarwal.

I took my father to this hospital due to chest pain. Hospital atmosphere was clean and good. Dr. Lalith Agarwal is a pleasant n cool doctor. He listen the patients problems clearly, then done some tests and explained very well what's he diagnosed and what's the problem. Then give medication n suggest how to take care. I think he is the only cardiologist available in Manikonda, As he recently started his own clinic. I suggest this doctor without any hesitation...😊😊
Thankyou Dr.Lalith Agarwal..🙏🏻

reply_text:
Thanq mr budhani ji.
Angiogram was not required for you. TMT test was all that was required. It was negative. Just control ur diabetes levels. U should be fine. Take care.

review: Properly diagnosed my mother CM Lakshmi Devi heart problem.Suggested angioplasty.Accordingly it was performed on 19.02.2020.Gave very good discharge advice . Hoping for my mother's recovery.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: It’s been a pleasant experience with Dr Agarwal. He is very approachable, friendly and empathetic. He has gone through all our previous records, made some tests, explained the issue and advised on things to be taken care. Overall we are happy with the consulting.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Father was advises coronary angiography. After visiting doctor he recommended that angiography is not required and suggested only medicines. Very happy to understand that father did not have any cardiac issues. Would highly recommend dr agarwal for any one requiring angiography.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: met the doctor for hypertension. was relieved to see that he didn't prescribe too many investigations as doctors do now a days. prescribed yoga and healthy life style rather than directing me to the pharmacy. overall satisfaction on seeing him. I recommend him for Hypertension and related treatments

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Had chest pain. TMT came positive so Dr gave medications. Used but had no reliefe. So Dr advised angiogram. Underwent with some hesitation but luckily had no blocks. On medications and having good reliefe of chest pain . Would highly recommend for chest pain and cardiac issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Had high blood pressure. And severe chest pain.  Doctor took full history and examined properly.  Did ecg and echo and gave me medications. I'm very happy with the treatment.  Blood pressure is better now and chest pain has reduced. Would highly recommend.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review: Visited Dr lalith Agarwal for my mother's treatment. She is diabetic and hypertensive. She had chest pain so got evuluated with Dr Agarwal. Her TMT came positive. Was on treatment but chest pain did not come down. Subsequently angiography was done which showed blocks and stenting was done. Now my mother is better and free of chest pain. I would highly recommend him any cardiac related issues. Especially if any procedure is required he does it very well.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr Lalith makes the patient comfortable by listening to the problem in detail and making an effort to understand the symptoms rather than giving textbook judgement / diagnosis straight away. Logically explains the treatment plan and gives minimum medication as needed. Very satisfied.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Reviewed all my reports on Cholestrol which is in higher range. Enquired on my family health history. Suggested to go for ECG and TMT. Recommended to have a Diet/Life style change to bring Cholestrol under control and to continue with it for life time to lead a better healthy life, which is truly missing in my case.
